header.subtitle: Sky Parking is one of the best parking place operators in Indonesia. The company has grown from humble beginnings to become a leading company in its field. Founded on the spirit of professionalism and product excellence, this company creates unparalleled quality in various aspects of its business.

content01.title: Vision
content01.content: To become the preferred parking solution provider in Indonesia.

header.title: Future Parking Solutions
header.subtitle: Make every journey more comfortable with SKY Parking, the choice parking place for a better future.

content02.title: Tap In Tap Out (TITO)
content02.content: Non-Cash Payment will reduce leaks and make monitoring, etc., easier, as well as facilitate and speed up transactions at the exit gate.

content03.title: QRIS Payment
content03.content: Parking payment at SKY Parking is easier with QRIS payment method. Simply scan the QR code and enjoy the convenience without having to carry cash and with guaranteed security.

content04.title: Membership
content04.content: Non-Cash Payment will reduce leaks and make monitoring, etc., easier, as well as facilitate and speed up transactions at the exit gate.

content05.title: E-wallet Payment
content05.content: To facilitate our customers' transactions, we have collaborated with several payment channels in Indonesia such as OVO, Go-Pay, LinkAja, and others.

content07.title: User-friendly and Realtime Dashboard
content07.content: Witness the parking world in the palm of your hand with real-time data presented directly from the field. Our customers can easily view real-time information, make smart decisions, and optimize their parking experience. SKY Parking, where every detail is perfectly arranged to ensure an unforgettable parking experience!

content08.title: Various Forms of Collaboration

content01.title: Smart Parking Services Solution for the Future
content01.subtitle: Cloud-based parking management system innovation, focusing on providing the best experience for users.

content02.title: Fast Process
content02.content: The payment system reading process is faster, 2-3 seconds

content03.title: Realtime Dashboard
content03.content: Transaction data can be monitored in real-time. Monitor the number of transactions and transaction values

content04.title: VIP Parking
content04.content: Parking areas specifically provided for guests or customers with VIP (Very Important Person) status.

content05.title: Without Attendants
content05.content: Security surveillance can be done entirely with technology.

content06.title: Varied Payment Systems
content06.content: Variety of non-cash payment options, non-cash cards, and payment through digital wallets

content07.title: Valet
content07.content: Drivers don't need to worry about finding parking spaces, as valet attendants will handle all of that.
